post.author: 강재형
post.content:
Advertisement number: 68412
Title: Internet site designer (Content Focused) (NOC: 2175)  
Terms of Employment: Permanent, Full Time, Day
Salary: To be negotiated, Bonus
Anticipated Start Date: As soon as possible  
Location: Toronto Centre, Ontario (1 vacancy)
Skill Requirements:  
  Education: Completion of high school, Completion of college/CEGEP/vocational or technical training, Other: Content Management Experience an Asset.
Credentials (certificates, licences, memberships, courses, etc.): Other: Credentials required.
Experience: 3 - 5 years, Other: Portfolio!
Languages: Speak English, Speak French, Read English, Read French, Write English, Write French, Other: French a strong asset.
Work Setting Experience: Consulting firm, Internet Service Provider, Software developer
Operating Systems: MS Windows 95/98/NT/2000
Programming Languages: ASP, HTML, DHTML, XML, Java Script, CSS
Applications: Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Aldus Freehand, Flash, MS Excel, MS FrontPage, MS Office, MS PowerPoint, MS Visio, WordPerfect
Management Systems (erp or db): MS SQL Server, MySQL
Communication Protocols: LAN
Generic Skills: Math skills (ex., use math related to money, measurement, calculation, estimation, budgeting, scheduling, data analysis), Computer use (ex., use software packages; knowledge of hardware; work with computer-operated machinery), Writing skills (ex., enter information on forms; write to inform, persuade, or analyze), Reading skills (ex., follow written directions; interpret documents like charts, maps; acquire specialized knowledge), Working with others (ex., work with individual or team; build consensus), Planning and organizing skills (ex., manage priorities; order tasks efficiently), Problem-solving skills (ex., identify problem causes; determine steps to resolve; assess solution), Speaking and listening skills (ex., communicate clearly and effectively; follow directions; mediate disputes)
Other Information: Knowledge of and Experience with Cold Fusion a strong asset. . IMPORTANT: SEND RESUME THROUGH EMAIL ONLY. . PLEASE DO NOT CALL OR SEND RESUME THROUGH FAX OR MAIL.

Employer: Web Impact Inc.

How to Apply:  By E-mail: info@webimpact.com

Business Profile: Since 1996, Web Impact has been helping organizations of all types to employ the Internet as a powerful business and communications medium.
Web Site: www.webimpact.com
Advertised until: 2002/08/09
post.title: Internet Site Designer
